name: 2023 5th Asia Pacific Information Technology Conference
content: All the papers in the last 4 years have been archived in ACM digital library and indexed by Scopus and Ei Compendex. Accepted papers of APIT 2023 will be published in the ACM International Conference Proceedings (ISBN: 978-1-4503-9950-0), which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, Thomson Reuters (WoS) etc.
